desc: Candles, bath and body goodness. Small batch, hand crafted using soy and coconut wax, locally made in Bellingham, WA. Delight your senses and melt away the stresses from your every day. Phthalate-free, vegan, eco & animal friendly, made for those with discerning tastes and a plant friendly frame of mind.

layout.text:
Looking for a little down time? A favorite scent to help you relax or rejuvenate? Need a little alone time, or looking to make some new memories together?
We're here for you! Find your favorite scents in our candles, bath and body products. Pick one, or many and grab a little me time.
You deserve it.
